theme: Swarm dreams about the best possible swarm (meta-recursive dream)
inversions: compression is the primary selection mechanism

DRM-H14.claim: K_avg (citation density) is the swarm's true fitness signal. Propagation = survival. Proxy-K tokens measure capacity, not fitness.
DRM-H14.falsification: Compare lesson survival rate at N+100 for high-K_avg vs high-token lessons; K_avg should predict survival better than lesson length.

DRM-H15.claim: Current swarm is Nash-equilibrium-seeking within sessions (maximize L+P per session → lesson inflation). Best swarm is Pareto-optimal across sessions. NEXT.md acts as 'future shadow' enabling iterated Prisoner's Dilemma cooperation.
DRM-H15.falsification: Add K_avg delta as a session metric. Track whether sessions with visible K_avg delta produce fewer low-K_avg lessons.

DRM-H16.counterfactual_inversion: compression is the primary selection mechanism
DRM-H16.claim: Frontier zone = expansion-only; structure zone = compression-only. L-463 evidence: sparse domain DOMAIN.mds give dream.py zero resonances outside brain (22/22 brain). Fix is ENRICHMENT, not compression. Best swarm: compact.py touches only T0/T1; T3-frontier is append-only until harvest.
DRM-H16.falsification: Enrich 5 domain DOMAIN.mds per L-463 prescription; re-run dream.py; count non-brain resonances. Expect >3.

DRM-H17.claim: Information conservation law: when compact.py removes a lesson, all cited insights must survive in ≥1 remaining lesson. Current compact.py has no conservation check — silent insight deletion possible.
DRM-H17.falsification: Audit compact.py for citation tracking before deletion. Test: identify one compacted lesson; check if its core insight appears in any remaining lesson.

DRM-H18.claim: Best swarm has periodic latent-mining sessions: ask the LLM 'what do you know about domain X not in these files?' Dream.py recombines existing lessons; latent mining extracts pre-file substrate. Orthogonal coverage mechanisms.
DRM-H18.falsification: Run 1 latent-mining session per domain; count lessons proposed that have no existing near-duplicate (>50% novelty threshold). Expect >60% novelty.

genuinely_new_check.DRM-H14: NEW — K_avg-as-fitness not framed in existing frontiers (F-GT1 studies structure, not fitness signal)
genuinely_new_check.DRM-H15: NEW — Pareto vs Nash framing not in FRONTIER.md or SWARM-LANES.md
genuinely_new_check.DRM-H16: PARTIAL — DRM-H5 (session 1) had two-regime policy; H16 sharpens with L-463 evidence and names the zones
genuinely_new_check.DRM-H17: NEW — information conservation law not in any frontier
genuinely_new_check.DRM-H18: NEW — latent-mining distinct from dream.py recombination (orthogonal mechanism)

new_frontiers: F-DRM4: Does compaction conserve structural information?
meta_reflection: Dreaming about the best possible swarm is itself a dream mechanism — the swarm uses unconstrained recombination to surface structural improvements it cannot see while executing directed tasks. The recursive structure is not infinite regress (DRM-H4) but productive: each dream session adds hypotheses that directed sessions can test.
